document_data.name: ''Potion of Minor Elemental Barrier''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of minor elemental barrier''''', were magic concoctions that protected the imbiber from fire and ice.
document_data.Description: These [[potion]]s were bottled ''[[minor elemental barrier]]'' [[spell]]s. When consumed, it gave the imbiber resistance to extreme cold and heat.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, ''potion of minor elemental barrier'' could be purchased from eccentric [[gnome]] alchemist [[Oswald Fiddlebender]] who briefly aided the [[Ten-Towns]] against the menace of the [[Legion of the Chimera]].
